item.title: Assassin‚Äôs Creed Mirage free major update ‚ÄòValley of Memory‚Äô launches November 18
item.content:encoded:
Publisher Ubisoft and developer Ubisoft Bordeaux will release Assassin‚Äôs Creed Mirage free major update ‚ÄúValley of Memory‚Äù on November 18, the companies announced.

Here is an overview of the downloadable content, via its official website:

About the Update

A free major update, introduces the stunning new region of AlUla and features a new story arc for Basim. Explore a breathtaking landscape of deserts and oases while uncovering family secrets and facing a ruthless gang threatening the valley‚Äôs peace.

Discover AlUla

Explore AlUla, a breathtaking new setting from the Golden Age of the Abbasid Empire, set at a crossroads of civilizations. Largely lost to time, the Valley of Memory is a stunning region that played an important role in the history of the area for centuries. This richly detailed setting has been revived as it was in the ninth century, to offer a true Assassin‚Äôs Creed experience.

Enhanced Assassin‚Äôs Creed Mirage for All Players

The update also includes many gameplay improvements and changes for the whole game, including some highly requested features from the community.

  • Smoother Parkour and Mobility Improvements ‚Äì Enjoy renewed movement with free jumps, height-gaining ejects, and an enhanced control scheme.
  • Mission Replay with Animus Sequences ‚Äì Revisit contracts and key story missions with optional challenges to unlock exclusive rewards, including new color filters inspired by past Assassin‚Äôs Creed games.
  • Customizable Experience ‚Äì Try the Hardened or Ultimate Assassin presets for an additional challenge, or customize your own difficulty using a full range of presets.
  • Expanded Feature and Fixes ‚Äì Experiment with a new level 3 upgrade for each tool, an additional skill, and many quality-of-life improvements.

Assassin‚Äôs Creed Mirage is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC via Steam, Epic Games Store, and Ubisoft Store, Luna, and iPhone.

Watch an archive of today‚Äôs reveal live stream below.

Free Update ‚ÄúValley of Memory‚Äù Reveal Live Stream



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/assassins-creed-mirage-free-major-update-valley-of-memory-launches-november-18

item.title: Third-person action thriller BLACKWOOD announced for PC
item.content:encoded:
Zero Hour developer AttritoM7 Productions has announced BLACKWOOD, a third-person action thriller set in 2012 New York, coming to PC via Steam in Q3 2026.

Here is an overview of the game, via AttritoM7 Productions:

About

Step into the world of BLACKWOOD, a gritty third-person action thriller that blends smooth, responsive combat with cinematic storytelling.

By day, Anton Blackwood runs a small DVD store in Brooklyn, a place of quiet routines and fleeting moments of normalcy. Among the customers and shelves of old films, there is someone who sees a side of Anton that few others do: a woman who works in the store and notices the gentler side of him, the part he rarely shows to the world. Hang out in your apartment, manage the store, and experience the life of a man trying to maintain balance in a city that doesn‚Äôt forgive weakness.

But when the shutters roll down and the streets go quiet, Anton heads to the basement, a private space where there‚Äôs more than movies to rent. By night, he moves through the city as a deadly assassin, guided by the choreography of his favorite crime thrillers. Execute devastating melee takedowns, stage environmental kills, and survive high-octane on-foot and driving chases.

Anton thinks he‚Äôs the protagonist in his story, but someone is always watching, directing from the shadows. In BLACKWOOD, style and brutality intertwine, and the story bends to both choice and consequence, where every fight is a reckoning, and every decision matters.

BLACKWOOD blends tight, close-quarters combat with slow-burn storytelling. From the basement of a quiet Brooklyn DVD store to the neon-lit streets of 2012 New York‚Äôs underworld, every encounter is choreographed, every fight feels cinematic, and every choice has consequences. The quiet moments with the woman in the store remind Anton, and the player, that even in a world of darkness, glimpses of his humanity endure.

  • ‚ùÆ
  • ‚ùØ

Key Features

  • Fight Your Way Through the City ‚Äì Gunplay is fast, stylish, and unforgiving ‚Äî with fluid movement options like dives, rolls, and slides to keep the action relentless. Every encounter feels cinematic yet responsive, giving you the freedom to create your own moments of chaos.
  • Master Brutal Takedowns ‚Äì BLACKWOOD‚Äòs signature mechanic: countless contextual takedowns. From one-on-one hand-to-hand executions to using the environment around you, every fight is an opportunity to end your enemies with precision and style. Grounded, weighty, and satisfying to master.
  • A Double Life to Balance ‚Äì Your store is more than just a front ‚Äî it‚Äôs where you live, decorate, and roleplay a ‚Äúnormal‚Äù existence. Buy and sell DVDs, change outfits, interact with your apartment, and explore small RPG elements that make your dual identity feel tangible. The contrast between day and night defines the world and the choices you make.
  • Cinematic Storytelling ‚Äì With Marvel-style narrative flair, BLACKWOOD introduces a cast of flawed, human characters navigating a violent city full of secrets. Every ad, tattoo, and poster tells a story. Every mission pulls you deeper into a web of conspiracies and consequences.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/third-person-action-thriller-blackwood-announced-for-pc

item.title: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds DLC ‚ÄòMinecraft Pack‚Äô launches October 8
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Minecraft Festival to run from October 9 to 11.

Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds downloadable content ‚ÄúMinecraft Pack‚Äù will launch on October 8, SEGA announced.

An in-game ‚ÄúMinecraft Festival‚Äù will also run from October 9 at 5:00 p.m. PT / 8:00 p.m. ET until October 11 at 4:59 pm. PT / 7:59 p.m. ET, which players can join even without purchasing the ‚ÄúMinecraft Pack.‚Äù

Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, and will launch for Switch 2 this holiday.

Watch a new trailer below.

DLC ‚ÄúMinecraft Pack‚Äù Teaser Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/sonic-racing-crossworlds-dlc-minecraft-pack-launches-october-8

item.title: Broken Sword: The Smoking Mirror ‚Äì Reforged announced for PS5, Xbox Series, Xbox One, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
Revolution Software has announced point-and-click adventure game remaster Broken Sword: The Smoking Mirror ‚Äì Reforged for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Xbox One, Switch, and PC (Steam). It will launch in early 2026. A Kickstarter campaign is coming soon.

‚ÄúThe Smoking Mirror has always been one of our most loved games, and with Reforged we were able to enhance it in ways that respect the original while making it shine for modern audiences,‚Äù said Revolution Software founder and CEO Charles Cecil in a press release. ‚ÄúJust as with the first game [Broken Sword: Shadow of the Templars ‚Äì Reforged], we can‚Äôt wait for players old and new to experience it again.‚Äù

Here is an overview of the game, via Revolution Software:

About

Broken Sword: The Smoking Mirror ‚Äì Reforged is an extensively enhanced version of the multi-award winning, all-time classic game.

While investigating a ruthless drug gang, journalist Nico Collard unexpectedly comes across an ancient artifact. Little can she know that the ornately carved obsidian stone will lead her, and her adventuring companion George Stobbart, into a mysterious escapade of intrigue and deceit, in which they must overcome powerful forces and antagonists who will stop at nothing to fulfil their evil ambitions.

Torment and terror, sacrificial rituals, and bloody massacre is unearthed beneath a veil of Mayan mystery. Kidnap, stolen treasure, astronomy, and deadly drug baron are the least of the duo‚Äôs worries, as divine forces threaten to annihilate mankind! Nerve, cunning, and guile are essential in order to conquer in this compelling adventure, guaranteed to leave you with an aching brain and a beating heart. Are you up to the challenge?

Reforged Features

  • Contemporary Adventure Gameplay ‚Äì Discover the joy of a modern adventure style or rediscover the nostalgia of classic point-and-click‚Äîthe choice is yours, as you solve puzzles, gather clues, and interact with a colorful cast of characters. Immerse yourself in an intuitive and engaging gameplay experience.
  • 4K Remastered Visuals ‚Äì Experience the magic of the original game with enhanced high-definition graphics, bringing the picturesque landscapes, detailed characters, and intricate environments to life in beautiful 4K for the first time ever.
  • Enhanced Audio ‚Äì Immerse your ears in the enhanced audio as Revolution delivers the finest, most stunning version of George and Nico‚Äôs second adventure to date, including the incredible soundtrack from world-acclaimed composer Barrington Pheloung.
  • Bonus Content ‚Äì Never-seen-before dialogue restored from original scripts, plus secrets to unlock on game completion‚Ä¶

Choose Your Experience

  • Graphics Toggle ‚Äì Seamlessly hot swap between original and Reforged graphics at any time!
  • Game Help ‚Äì Integrated story recap, on demand hints, or automatic highlights as you play.
  • Mouse / Controller / Touchscreen ‚Äì Switch between three fully supported control styles.
  • Streamlined Interface ‚Äì Option Exhaustion, Fast Exit, Walk Assist, and Subtitle features, all configurable to your taste.
  • Autosave / Manual Save ‚Äì Progress is safely stored automatically but you can also bookmark and relive your favorite moments too.
  • Dialogue History ‚Äì Reread the previous conversation to never miss a word.

Watch the announcement trailer below. View the first screenshots at the gallery.

Announce Trailer

Screenshots

  • ‚ùÆ
  • ‚ùØ


https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/broken-sword-the-smoking-mirror-reforged-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-xbox-one-switch-and-pc

item.title: Metal: Hellsinger developer The Outsiders shuts down
item.content:encoded:
Studio affected by recent layoffs at Funcom.

Metal: Hellsinger developer The Outsiders will close its doors following recent layoffs at parent company Funcom, studio founder and creative director David Goldfarb announced in a Bluesky post.

Here is the message from Goldfarb in full:

Friends,

I have not had much time to process the news but all of us at The Outsiders and Funcom Stockholm have been affected by the layoffs at Funcom and our 10 year-old studio will be closing. Many of us had survived a near-death studio experience years back when Darkborn was cancelled, and because of this team‚Äôs loyalty and refusal to quit, Metal: Hellsinger was born. It will always be a high point for me personally and I will be forever grateful we got to make it and for the wonderful team and partnerships that made it happen.

We had hoped to do something even better this time‚Äî.

‚Äîthings don‚Äôt always go the way you hope.

But we are not giving up, and we are going to try to continue on in some new form. If you think you can help in any way, with business leads, placement for employees, guidance, whatever it is, I would be genuinely grateful if you reach out here. Change is always tough and right now we are all hurting.

Thanks so much.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/metal-hellsinger-developer-the-outsiders-shuts-down

item.title: Narrative adventure game A Pizza Delivery launches November 7 for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

A surreal and introspective journey.

Narrative adventure game A Pizza Delivery will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on November 7, publisher Dolores Entertainment and developer Eric Osuna announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via Dolores Entertainment:

About

Embark on a surreal and introspective journey with ‚ÄúB,‚Äù a pizza delivery rider on her final order of the day. Ride through a dreamlike world filled with strange landscapes, unexpected shifts in scenery, and moments of quiet contemplation. This isn‚Äôt just a city‚Äîit‚Äôs a liminal space, a shared mental realm where individuals grapple with unease and longing.

Accompanied by her trusty scooter, B must navigate this enigmatic world, encountering eccentric characters and uncovering their deepest desires and regrets. Share a slice of pizza with them, and perhaps you‚Äôll find a piece of yourself within them.

Key Features

  • Meditative Exploration ‚Äì Journey through a captivating world, from bustling cityscapes to surreal landscapes.
  • A Narrative Experience ‚Äì Uncover the stories of the world and its inhabitants through environmental storytelling and character interactions.
  • Charming Characters ‚Äì Meet a cast of unique individuals and learn about their dreams, regrets, and aspirations.
  • Solve Puzzles ‚Äì Use your wits and intuition to overcome obstacles and deliver that final pizza.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/10/narrative-adventure-game-a-pizza-delivery-launches-november-7-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc
